text: Jan Rabson (June 14, 1954 â€“ October 14, 2022) was an Canadian-American actor. ==Acting roles== ===Animated roles=== * All-New Dennis the Menace - Additional Voices * Animaniacs - Papa * Batman Beyond - Rocketeer Leader * Creepy Crawlers - Top Hat, Volt Jolt * Denver, the Last Dinosaur - Additional Voices * James Bond Jr. - Auric Goldfinger, Gordon "Gordo" Leiter, Jaws, Oddjob, Worm * Justice League - Professor Erlich * Pinky and the Brain - Farmer, Referee * Skeleton Warriors - Additional Voices * Space Cats - Additional Voices * Street Fighter II V - Additional Voices * Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Kerma * The Pirates of Dark Water - Additional Voices * The Real Adventures of Jonny Quest - Avery, Donaldson * The Yogi Bear Show - Additional Voices ===Live action roles=== * Hercules: The Legendary Journeys - Pyro ===Movie roles=== * A Bug's Life - Axel * Akira - Elichi Watanabe, Tetsuo Shima * Black Jack: The Movie - Son * Cars - Various Reporter * Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs - Additional Voices * Despicable Me 2 - Additional Voices * Despicable Me 3 - Additional Voices * Finding Nemo - Davey Reynolds, Flying Fish, Seagulls * Happily N'Ever After - Additional Voices * Hercules - Driver * Horton Hears a Who!
